thread.section_title: The Montcalm London Marble Arch - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Stunning service
thread.title_full: Stunning service - Review of The Montcalm London Marble Arch, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Закатова М
title: Stunning service
text: All I great , clean and comfortable. Quiet peace of luxury services . Thanks to staff for their attentive care . Hope to be back. The breakfast is nice . Location is convenient neither for sight seeing and business trips - you can easily reach the tube by 7 mins walking . There are a lot of places of interests not far from here and bars and restaurants. It is the right place to relax and make some treatments ( body face etc )
